name: tm41
effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Prevents the foe from using the same move in a row.
flavor_text.emerald: Prevents the foe from using the same move in a row.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: It enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move successively.
